import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import Checkoutsteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' const PaymentScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { history.push('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(setPaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history.push('/placeorder') } return (

Payment Method

Select Method setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}> {/* setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}> */}
) } export default PaymentScreen
